name: An Empty House, An Empty Heart.
name_original: An Empty House, An Empty Heart.
description:
Controls:

Press the blank button on top to start the game 

A and D to move

Hold shift to run

Press E to interact when you see the prompt

Press F and Space to forward dialogue

Disclaimer:

This is not complete and the game is more of a proof of concept than a finished project. We hope to release a complete and polished version in the future. Thank you for your patience.

Description:

Porter, the neighbor of the Michaels family visits the family which seems to be a stress induced environment with Malcom Michaels, the father of the family being strung to the wire with work and raising his three kids all by himself. Follow Porter as he discovers what happens to the family and how it became the way it did.
